content:
DataServiceCodeVersion Enum

Definition

Specifies the version of the Open Data Protocol (OData) targeted by the generated code.

In this Article

public enum DataServiceCodeVersion
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
DataServiceCodeVersion

Fields

V1

Generate code that targets version 1.0.
V2

Generate code that targets version 2.0.
